hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo su - root<<EOF #gpgkey=http://repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP3/OS/aarch64/RPM-GPG-KEY-openEuler cat > /etc/yum.repos.d/openEuler.repo <<EOF2 [copy] name=copy baseurl=http://121.36.84.172/repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP3/update_mytest/aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=http://121.36.84.172/repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP3/update_20220606/RPM-GPG-KEY-openEuler
[e] name=e baseurl=https://repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP3/everything/aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=http://repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP3/everything/aarch64/RPM-GPG-KEY-openEuler EOF2 cat /etc/yum.repos.d/openEuler.repo yum install atune -y EOF
